Literature.Title: A Novel Deoxynivalenol-Activated Wheat Arl6ip4 Gene Encodes an Antifungal Peptide with Deoxynivalenol Affinity and Protects Plants against Fusarium Pathogens and Mycotoxins
Literature.Author: Liu G, Zuo DY, Yang P, He W, Yang Z, Zhang J, Wu AB, Yi SY, Li HP, Huang T, Liao YC

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Fusarium graminearum 5035(IC50=22±1.5µM),Alternaria alternata(IC50=25±2.6µM),Fusarium oxysporum(IC50=>200µM),Colletotrichum higginsianum(IC50=>200µM),Sclerotinia sclerotiorum(IC50=>200µM)
